General.Name: Vishwaraj Sugar Industries Limited
General.Description: Vishwaraj Sugar Industries Limited manufactures and sells sugar and other related products in India. It operates through Sugar, Co-Generation, Distillery, Vinegar, and IML segments. The company also produces distillery products, including ethanol, and rectified and extra-neutral spirits; and bagasse, molasses, brewed vinegar, compost, press-mud, and carbon dioxide. In addition, it is involved in the co-generation of electricity with an installed capacity of 36.4 MW. The company was formerly known as Vishwanath Sugar and Steel Industries Limited and changed its name to Vishwaraj Sugar Industries Limited in November 2012. Vishwaraj Sugar Industries Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Belgaum, India.
